0.name: Perfect
0.description: Game functions flawless with no audio or graphical glitches, all tested functionality works as intended without any workarounds needed.

1.name: Great
1.description: Game functions with minor graphical or audio glitches and is playable from start to finish. May require some workarounds.

2.name: Okay
2.description: Game functions with major graphical or audio glitches, but game is playable from start to finish with workarounds.

3.name: Bad
3.description: Game functions, but with major graphical or audio glitches. Unable to progress in specific areas due to glitches even with workarounds.

4.name: Intro/Menu
4.description: Game is completely unplayable due to major graphical or audio glitches. Unable to progress past the Start Screen.

5.name: Won't Boot
5.description: The game crashes when attempting to startup.

99.name: Not Tested
99.description: This game has not yet been tested.
